1.20.1.1.0.1.6: - Added a versions.json to allow for update checking
1.20.1.1.0.1.9: - Added missing Gradle task for generating version information
1.20.1.1.0.1.11: - Remove Git version tagging to save build time
1.20.1.1.1.0.12:
- Added proper support for custom elements
- Added translations for all element groups
1.20.1.1.1.0.13: - Fixed duplicated tooltips in generated compound dust items
1.20.1.1.1.0.14: - Fixed crash on server due to NoSuchFieldException caused by runtime dist cleaner
1.20.1.1.1.0.15:
- Fixed wrong country code for czech translations
- Added automatic upload to CurseForge and Modrinth
1.20.1.1.1.0.16: - (Hopefully) fixed issues in the CI configuration causing uploads to fail
1.20.1.1.1.0.17: - Fixed broken CurseGradle cofiguration in CI
1.20.1.1.1.0.18: - Added missing changelog property to publishing configurations
1.20.1.1.1.0.19: - Finalized automatic deployment to CurseForge and Modrinth
